name: In The Dark (itch) (yxGameDev)
description:
A fast-paced, procedurally generated action game

    Explore a randomized dungeon while collecting shards, a powerful item that you need to escape. Find a map or a compass along the way, and be sure to avoid spikes and darts!

    In The Dark is designed to be difficult to play, but don't let that stop you! Try to beat it as fast as possible!

    A word to the wise: use the mini-map in the bottom right!

    Enjoy!

    -yx

      If you encounter any dificulties, please let us know in the comments.

  

version 1.8
